header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 88, page 74, line 32, at end insert “to this end promoting the use of joint interprofessional education of clinical and social care staff where appropriate,”
000: Schedule 7, page 118, line 27, at beginning insert—
“(A1) The HRA must appoint a committee for the purpose of giving advice—
text.IndentOne: (a) to the HRA in connection with the exercise of the HRA’s function under regulation 5(1)(a) of the Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002 (S.I. 2002/1438) (approval for processing confidential patient information);

(b) to the Secretary of State in connection with the exercise of the Secretary of State’s functions under regulations 2, 3(4) and 5 of those Regulations (processing of confidential patient information).”

text.quote: 000: Schedule 7, page 118, line 27, at end insert—
“(1A) The committee appointed under sub-paragraph (A1) must consist of persons who are not members or employees of the HRA.”
000: Schedule 7, page 118, line 28, leave out “A” and insert “Any other”
000: Schedule 7, page 118, line 28, leave out from “include” to end of line 29 and insert “such persons”
000: Clause 77, page 64, line 8, leave out “(2A)” and insert “(5)”
000: Clause 77, page 64, line 11, leave out “(2AA) Nor” and insert “(5A) Nor, in the case of an NHS foundation trust,”
000: Clause 77, page 64, line 16, leave out “(2B)” and insert “(6)”
000: Clause 77, page 64, line 18, leave out “(2A) or (2AA)” and insert “(5) or (5A)”
000: Clause 77, page 65, line 10, at end insert—
“( ) In paragraph 15(4) of Schedule 14 to the Health and Social Care Act 2012 (abolition of NHS trusts in England: consequential amendments to section 65F of the National Health Service Act 2006)—
text.IndentOne: (a) in the new subsection (2A) to be inserted by paragraph 15(4), in paragraph (a), for “65DA” substitute “65DA(1)(a)”,
text.quote: “(2AA) Nor may the administrator provide the draft report to the regulator under subsection (1) without having obtained from the Care Quality Commission a statement that it considers that the recommendation in the draft report would achieve that part of the objective set out in section 65DA(1)(aa).”, and
text.IndentOne: (c) in the new subsection (2B) to be inserted by paragraph 15(4)—
text.IndentTwo: (i) after “Where the Board” insert “or the Care Quality Commission”,
(ii) for “to that effect” substitute “to the effect mentioned in subsection (2A) or (2AA)”, and
(iii) after “, the Board” insert “or (as the case may be) the Commission”.”
